UPGRADED AIR VENT HOOK: This car vent phone holder mount is designed as “Hook shape” and form “Three grasp points” which can firmly hook around the a/c vent for no slippage or movement. It solving the market’s common problem of falling forward and off the air vent constantly when going over bumps or turns. NOTE: THE LENGTH OF CLAMP BETWEEN 0.41-0.98IN. THIS PHONE HOLDER ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH HORITABLE AIR VENT.
AUTO LOCK, NO MORE FALL :This gravity slide-in car phone holder creatively features the Auto-lock arm-slots that stretch on the side can auto adjust to hold phone more firmly without fears of bumps. Compared to manual lock version which being loose frequently, as its automatic rebound design you no need for secondary adjustment. Special curve of arms fit phone better. The phone was all-round protected by silicone rubber on the inside clamps. NOTE:MAXIMUM THICKNESS OF DEVICE IS 14MM (0.5IN).
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: This universal car cell phone holder will firmly hold all the smart phones (4-7in) even with thicker case (â‰¤14mm) compatible with iPhone 13 12 pro max/ 11 pro max/XR/X/8/7/6/5, Note 20 10/ Galaxy S10+/ S9/ S8 /S7 /S6 and more. NOTE:WE RECOMMEND USING THE SMALLER PHONE(ï¼œ4.7inch) WITH PHONE CASE
NO BLOCK VENT & SAFER DRIVING: This car vent phone mount with folding back structure is very neat and keep it small when not in use, only 1/2 card size and 3 inches away from the vent to still allow air flow. You can have a wider sight and adjust this gravity car phone holder up/down or left/right. NOTE: THE HORIZONTAL MODE IS NOT SUPPORTED.

Unique Gravity Design – The Easiest Operation

Eliminate the trouble operation of pressing button. You just slide in and the car phone holder mount will clamp the phone automatically by gravity.

BIG PHONE & THICK CASE FRIENDLY

This car phone holder mount which can fit the phone with thicker case within 0.5inch/14mm. It is perfect fit for all devices from 4 to 7 inches.

  • Compatible with iPhone 13 12 11 Pro Max XR XS Max X 8 Plus 7 6s Plus, Samsung Galaxy s20 ultra 5G note 20 Ultra 10 plus 9 plus s10 s9 a10e, Google Nexus 6P / 6, Google Pixel 3 XL, LG, Sony, HTC, Motorola, and more.
  • Compatible with Crystal case cover; Liquid silicone case; Bumper case; Otterbox defender (without the belt-clip holster)

Note: The wallet case does not suit it.

Ultra Stable Hook Design

This car phone holder mount is designed as “hook shape” which can vise the outlet blades tightly and firmly.

The length of the clamp between 10.5mm – 25 mm (0.41in 0.98in)

USING TIPS

  1. IT IS RECOMMENDED USE FOR THE HORIZONTAL VENT
  2. First, please mount the air vent clip the vent, and make sure that the clip are screwed. Then, just put your phone into the gravity phone holder, and it can be locked automatically. Last, just take out your phone when you want to release.
  3. This holder maximum support 0.4-1 inch long of blades, 0.1 inch thick of blades.
  4. It is recommend that re-tighten the air vent clip once two week to ensure it keep stable.

To My Best Love

How did we get started?

We started out as architects. Inspired by our day-to-day tool usage, we founded ForChic with a commitment to giving everyone the perfect tool they need.

What makes our products different?

Satisfying every customer is our ultimate pursuit. To get it, we need to optimize every detail at all costs.

Why do we love what we do?

We like to learn more about our competitors every day, learn from others’ strengths and improve them, and over time, our products will become more and more impeccable, and more and more customers will be satisfied.

High Precise Shape Duplication: Copy any shape or duplicate any object profile with ease. Great for tiling, wallpapering, circular frames, ducts fitting tiles, laminate, carpet, checking dimensions, moulding, etc. Useful tool for operations on car bodies, carpentry and for all kinds of modelling.
Adjustable Tightness and Locking Feature: Never worry about too loose or too tight of plastic pins to slide in. Using an bonus little Allen wrench You can simply adjust the tightness of plastic pins according to your preferences. Once the object has been contoured, lock contour gauge teeth in place for perfect identical traces every time.
Premium Material and Durable:The contour gauge is made of high quality ABS plastic, high strength, rustproof and durable, that will not easily break. And no harm for the surface of the target you would like to shape and duplicate. It is smooth to push and no lack of pins to influence precision.
Easy to Use: Guide the contour gauge’s teeth onto the object, lock the teeth in place, and trace. Copy it, Lock it, Trace it, Only 3 steps, you can easily copy and transfer the shape you want.
Customer Service: Quality and Customer Satisfaction are our top priorities. If you are not satisfied, no reason return policy to guarantee you the BEST purchase experience. And all ForChic products come with 24 hours friendly customer service.

With the ForChic Contour Gauge can easily copy any shape and is simple to use without any guessing, calculation and learning curve. Because it is simple and accurate, it can immediately reduce wasted materials and is good value for money. Very suitable for winding pipes, pipes, woodworking, most types of molding, etc.

Aluminum Lock Design

Metal locking mechanism keeps the shape stable to achieve high precisionï¼Œdesigned for easy transfer and efficient workï¼ŒMaking your work more convenient.

Premium Plastic and High Precision

The contour gauge shape duplicator is made of high quality ABS plastic,high strength,rustproof and durable.Single needle down to 0.06″, providing a more accurate data.

Widened Design is More Practical

ForChic contour gauge profile tool is 50% wider than traditional profile gauge, the deepest could reach 2.5 inches, making it very suitable to contour deeper shapes meticulously.

The Master Lock 178D Set Your Own Combination Padlock features a 2in (51mm) wide solid body for strength and reliability. The 5/16in (8mm) diameter shackle is 1in (25mm) long and made of hardened steel, offering extra resistance to cutting and sawing. The 4-digit dialing allows for thousands of possible numeric combinations. The Limited Lifetime Warranty provides peace of mind from a brand you know and can trust.
Indoor and outdoor padlock is best used as a school locker lock, gym lock, and gate lock, providing protection and security from theft
Set your own four-digit combination lock for easy combination recall; Combination change tool included
Combo lock is constructed with a solid body for strength and weatherability, hardened steel shackle for cut resistance
2 inch (51 millimeter) wide lock body; 5/16 inch (8 millimeter) diameter shackle with 1 inch (25 millimeter) length, 1 inch (25 millimeter) width
Shackle is preset to open on 0-0-0-0. Some instructions may incorrectly state shackle opens on l-o-c-k. See user manual in technical specifications section of this page for correct combination reset instructions.
